sen.j: 吉備姫王（きびひめのおおきみ・きびひめのみこ、生年不詳 - 皇極天皇2年9月11日 (旧暦)（643年10月28日）） は、日本の皇族（王族）。
sen.e: Kibitsuhime Okimi (year of birth unknown - October 28, 643) was in the Imperial (royal) family in Japan.
Kibitsuhime Okimi (year of birth unknown - October 28, 643) was in the Imperial (royal) family in Japan.
Kibitsuhime Okimi (year of birth unknown - October 31, 643) was in the Imperial (royal) family in Japan.

sen.j: 吉備島皇祖母命と尊称を受ける。
sen.e: She was granted the honorific title "Kibi no shima sumeramioya no mikoto".
She was granted the honorific title "Kibi no shima sumeramioya no mikoto".
She was granted the honorific title "Kibi no shima sumeramioya no mikoto".

sen.j: 桜井皇子（欽明天皇の皇子）の女。
sen.e: Her father was Prince Sakurai (Son of Emperor Kinmei).
Her father was Prince Sakurai (Son of Emperor Kinmei).
Her father was Prince Sakurai (Son of Emperor Kinmei).

sen.j: 茅渟王（押坂彦人大兄皇子の子）の妃となり、宝女王（皇極天皇）・軽王（孝徳天皇）を儲けた。
sen.e: She married Chinu no okimi (son of Oshisaka no Hikohito no Oenomiko) and had Takara no himemiko (Empress Kogyoku) and Prince Karu (Emperor Kotoku).
She married Chinu no okimi (son of Oshisaka no Hikohito no Oenomiko) and had Takara no himemiko (Empress Kogyoku) and Prince Karu (Emperor Kotoku).
